revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{confix|en|xyr|alt1=xyro|gloss1=razor|phobic}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # {{lb|en|rare}} {{l|en|abnormally|Abnormally}} fearful of {{l|en|razor|razors}} and other {{l|en|sharp}} cutting {{l|en|instrument|instruments}}. #* '''2004''', Douglas Walker and Graham Walker, ''The Official Rock Paper Scissors Strategy Guide'' ([[w:Simon & Schuster|Simon & Schuster]], {{ISBN|0743272625}}, [http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=wiBdDs58mosC&pg=PA83&dq=xyrophobic&hl=en&ei=5YICTv7tJIG98gPlsNDjCw&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=1&ved=0CDEQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=xyrophobic&f=false page 83] #*: Many people suffering from hair loss are also '''xyrophobic''', or have a fear of razors and other sharp cutting instruments.
